cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("dot_expander")

	DOT_EXPANDER("src").PATH("*")

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: dot_expander
processors:
  - dot_expander:
      tag: dot_expander_from_src_d4a85027
      field: src
      path: '*'
